title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook the spaghetti. In a separate pan, cook the pancetta until crispy. Beat the eggs and mix with grated cheeses and pepper. Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture off the heat to create a creamy sauce.

title: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until softened. Add tomatoes and stock, and simmer for 15 minutes. Add basil, blend until smooth, and season with salt and pepper.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger in oil until fragrant. Add curry powder and chicken, and cook until browned. Add coconut milk and bell pepper, and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread. Mash the avocado and spread it on the toast. Season with salt, pepper, and chili flakes.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Fold in chocolate chips. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10-12 minutes.
